column1: "A dark night, just my luck I get this case."
"One of my first crime scenes, where I collect most of the important information…"
"Luckily I can interact with certain things here to hear what they have to tell me."
"If I click on the evidence markers (with my mind) then I should learn a detail about the case."
"And if I talk with the other people here (by clicking on them (with my mind)) then I can talk with them as well."
"I have a hunch all the information here is important in some way to help solve the case."
"Certain things I notice I'll have to take a picture off, that important info will be a polaroid in my office."
"Once I've scoured the scene for clues, I should head back to my office…"
"By pressing the M button… with my mind…"
